summary: This code describes the goal of performing operations like copy, cut, and shuffle without relying on annotations while potentially reducing entropy.

details.comment: This code describes the goal of performing operations like copy, cut, and shuffle without relying on annotations while potentially reducing entropy.
details.content:
we want to learn the unspeakable. we want to be annotation free.
so basically we can do following operations:
copy, cut, shuffle
in which the entropy might be reduced.
